entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
